verbs.description: [V: Was] Emmanuel Macron trying to tell Donald Trump something ? The two leaders had another strong handshake and this one left a mark .
Was [ARG0: Emmanuel Macron] [V: trying] [ARG1: to tell Donald Trump something] ? The two leaders had another strong handshake and this one left a mark .
Was [ARG0: Emmanuel Macron] trying to [V: tell] [ARG2: Donald Trump] [ARG1: something] ? The two leaders had another strong handshake and this one left a mark .
Was Emmanuel Macron trying to tell Donald Trump something ? [ARG0: The two leaders] [V: had] [ARG1: another strong handshake] and this one left a mark .
Was Emmanuel Macron trying to tell Donald Trump something ? The two leaders had another strong handshake and [ARG0: this one] [V: left] [ARG1: a mark] .
